name: Upon Further Reflection
description:
UPON FURTHER REFLECTION

By: Allen “Allusion Crane” Starton

Abstract

Escape the ambush! Use the MIRROR WALLS and your MIRROR SHIELD ability to REFLECT the RED Enemies into one another to destroy them. Destroy all RED ENEMIES to escape!

However, lead scientist AZURE has discovered that only Pure MIRRORS can REFLECT the evil destructive power of the smashers, and developed the SMAHER REFLECTOR, which can project a MIRROR SHIELD around the user to reflect the smashers INTO EACH OTHER, destroying them instantly!

Yet the Smashers are hot on Azure’s trail… and have them cornered in the HALL OF MIRRORS. With death only a single touch away… Azure most use all of their physics knowledge, agility, and the their MIRROR SHIELD to eliminate the pursuing smashers, escape the hall of mirrors and share their discovery with the world, lest the world SMASHED TO BITS!

How to Play

Movement                                                       - W, A, S, D

Stop and Summon Mirror Shield        - Space
